content.question: Which of the following explanations would a developmental psychologist generally offer to Sarah?

choices.label: Positive punishment can encourage Connor to sit up.
Although sitting upright with no assistance is a major milestone, many babies will develop within a range of ages.
It is likely that Connor has a genetic disorder that needs to be treated immediately.
Connor needs physical therapy to help him coordinate his muscle movements better.

content.answer: Although sitting upright with no assistance is a major milestone, many babies will develop within a range of ages.

topic.text: 3.1: Themes and Methods in Developmental Psychology

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
